name: Root of all Evil - Game Jam 192
name_original: Root of all Evil - Game Jam 192
description:
Inspired by the theme "When we were young." Created by Two Guys No Game.

The Root of All Evil is a casual linear adventure game. You take control of the Tree-antula in a bid to grow from a small sapling into a towering Son of a Birch.
This Daddy Log Legs is on a bid to cleanse the world of the evil which threatens his forest home. Send his enemies to the mortua-tree and plant your own saplings to re-heal the land.

The Carniferous Creeper Crawley is a skilled Ash-assin. Inflicting a Greenhouse of Horrors that even Luci-Fir himself wood be pleased of.

You will need a mouse to interact with the game menus.

Xbox One Controller.

  • Left Stick (L3) Movement
  • A button: Interact
  • Start/ Back: Pause

Mouse / Keyboard controls:

  • WASD / Arrow Keys: 4 directional movement
  • Space Bar / Enter: Interact
  • ESC / P: Pause
